lead_paragraph: Mike McQueary, a graduate assistant in 2002 when he reported seeing Jerry Sandusky molesting a young boy, had aspirations of one day becoming a head coach.
snippet: Mike McQueary, a graduate assistant in 2002 when he reported seeing Jerry Sandusky molesting a young boy, had aspirations of one day becoming a head coach.
